help.name: Help
help.description:
Displays the command list, and detailed information on specific commands 

**[Usage: help <command>]**

note.name: Notepad
note.description:
Save any notes and bring them up later 

**Sub-commands:**
`k?note edit` - Replaces the entire note with the given text
`k?note append` - Adds a line with the content you've given, to the end of the note, preserving any previous content

quote.name: Message Quoter
quote.description:
Displays a message's content and author

**[Usage: quote <message-id> <optional: #channel>]**

welcome.name: Welcome Messages
welcome.description:
Displays a welcome message on a member's joining.

**Sub-commands:**
k?setchannel #channel - Sets the welcome message channel to the mentioned channel, or ID
k?welcome toggle - Disables/welcome welcome messages
k?welcome edit <message> - Set the welcome message for the server

**Welcome Message Syntax:**
**{member}** is replaced with `@user` when the user joins
**{member.username}** is replaced with the joining members username
**{guild}** is replaced with the server's name

tag.name: Tag Handler
tag.description:
Saves text to be accessed later
Can be deleted by force with **kk!t forcedelete tagname**, but only by a moderator

Tags can use the following:
{arg#} - Is replaced with an argument (ie. {arg1})
{carg#} - Does the same as {arg#}, but replaces with the caller's name if missing
{channel} - Is replaced with the message's channel
{caller} - Is replaced with the caller (ie. {caller} = @user)
{num:#;} - Generates a random number, # being the number
{choose;item;item;item} - Chooses from the given items (can be < 3 >)
{caller.name} - Is replaced by the caller's username
{n} - Adds a new line (Fix for oneline in YNA)
**Most YNA code will work**

**Usage:**
tag create <tagname> <tag content> | tag <tagname>
tag <tagname> cdel (true/false) `<-enables automatic caller deletion`

temp.name: Temperature Converters
temp.description:
Converts Celcius to Fahrenheit and vice/versa 

**[Usage: toc/tof/tok c/f/k <number>]**

snipe.name: Message Sniper
snipe.description:
Shows the content and author of the last deleted message 

**[Usage: snipe]**

fml.name: FML
fml.description:
Pulls a random FML post from AlexFlipnote's API [COMMAND NOT ENABLED] 

**[Usage: fml]**

randcolor.name: Random Color Generator
randcolor.description:
Gives a random hex color code and image from AlexFlipnote's API 

**[Usage: color]**

ud.name: Urban Dictionary
ud.description:
Returns a definition from the Urban Dictionary 

**[Usage: ud <terms>]**

inspirobot.name: Inspirobot
inspirobot.description:
Pulls a random image from Inspirobot's API 

**[Usage: inspirobot]**

bird.name: Random Bird Generator
bird.description:
Returns a random bird picture 

**[Usage: bird/birb]**

expand.name: Fullwidth converter
expand.description:
Converts text into fullwidth font 

**[Usage: expand <text>]**

uptime.name: Up Time
uptime.description: Shows the amount of time since my last restart

points.name: Points
points.description:
Shows the sender's point count (Currently in development) 

**[Usage: points]**

avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.description:
Displays the avatar of a user, based off of a ping, a user ID, or their display name (Their username if they don't have a nickname) 

**[Usage: avatar/avy <ID, @user, DisplayName]**

info.name: Information
info.description: Shows information on the bot (Authors, invite, version etc.)

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description:
Changes the bot's prefix **(Note: Bot will always respond to kk! regardless of custom prefix)** 

**[Usage: prefix/setprefix <prefix>]**

cat.name: Meow
cat.description:
Shows a random cat picture from a database 

**[Usage: cat/meow]**

rabbit.name: Rabbit
rabbit.description:
Shows a random rabbit picture from a database 

**[Usage: bunny/rabbit]**

coinflip.name: Coin Flip
coinflip.description: Flips a virtual coin and returns the side

8ball.name: 8-Ball
8ball.description:
Answers yes/no questions, also responds to **does, will, am etc.** 

**[Usage: 8ball <question>]**

interactions.name: Interaction Commands
interactions.description:
Interaction commands (hug, kiss, poke, pat), summon an appropriate gif for the action 

**[Usage: hug, poke, etc. <user/@user>]**

purge.name: Purge
purge.description:
Purges a defined number of messages 

**[Usage: purge <number (2 > #) `or` purge <argument>]** 

**Arguments:** 
**all** - Purges as many messages as possible
**user** - Purges a specific user's message (By ID or Mention) 
**bots** - Purges all recent bot messages

Messages over 14 days in age will throw an error, if you want to purge a lot of messages just use `purge all`

kick.name: Kick
kick.description:
Kicks a mentioned user and adds an entry to the audit log with the reason 

**[Usage: kick <@user> <reason>]**

ban.name: Ban
ban.description:
Bans a mentioned user and adds an entry to the audit log with the reason 

**[Usage: ban <@user> <reason>]**

youtube.name: Youtube Search
youtube.description:
Finds the first video for the search terms you give 

**[Usage: youtube/yt <search terms>]**

reportbug.name: Bug Reporting
reportbug.description:
Reports a bug to developers, please provide a detailed description of the bug with what caused it, misuse of this command will result in addition to the blacklist 

**[Usage: reportbug <description>]**

weather.name: Weather Reports
weather.description:
Displays current weather data for a city 

**[Example: weather Portland (returns information for Portland, OR]**

nonascii.name: ASCII Filter
nonascii.description:
Filters non-ascii characters from a given string, or a username if a mention is given 

**[Usage: nonascii <string> | nonascii @user]**

imgur.name: Imgur Uploader
imgur.description:
Uploads a linked image or an attached image
**The attached image must be attached to the command message**

roleban.name: Role Banning
roleban.description:
Removes all roles from a user and replaces them with one role, if one is chosen

**Uage:**
```roleban roleadd "role name" (With quotations if the role is more than 2 words)```
Adds a role by name, this role will be added after all others are removed, replacing the name with "off" will disable the role feature

```roleban @user/ID```
Rolebans the mentioned user

```unroleban @user/ID```
Removes roleban and restores the user's previous roles

roll.name: RPG Dice/Dice
roll.description:
Rolls a multiple sided die, a specified amount of times
**[Usage: roll <number of dice>d<number of sides>]**

profile.name: User Profiles
profile.description:
Creates a user profile, or views another user's. Example: `kk!profile @user` to view another user's, if already created, or `kk!profile` to view your own.

**Descriptions must be less than 175 chars**

**Badges:**
Use `profile badges` to view the list of badges
Use `profile badges customequip :emoji:` to equip a custom badge
Use `profile badges remove` to remove equipped badge
